duties_responsibilities.duty: Create and design structural drafting using Auto CAD software.
Leverage knowledge of wood framing design, wind lateral design, or material take-off to assist in the design process.
On-the-job training for proficiency in Auto CAD or REVIT software.
Detail-oriented approach to drafting and design.
Maintain accurate and organized documentation of drawings and designs.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Engineering or related field (preferred)
